00067 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00068 vu32 uADCGroupState = 1;    // 0: Stop, 1: Group 1, 2: Group 2.
00069 vu32 uADCGroupFinish = 0;   // 0: Not finish, 2: Finished.
00070 
00071 u32 uADCData[16];
00072 
00073 u32 uTimeTick500ms = 4;
00074 
00075 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00076 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00077   * @brief  Main program.
00078   * @retval None
00079   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00080 int main(void)
00081 {
00082   SysTick_Configuration();
00083 
00084   #if (ENABLE_DEBUG_IO == 1)
00085   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00086   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00087   #endif
00088 
00089   #if (ADC_GROUP_DATA_MODE == ADC_GROUP_DATA_MODE_DMA)
00090   PDMA_Configuration();
00091   #endif
00092 
00093   ADC_Configuration();
00094 
00095   #if (ENABLE_DEBUG_PRINTF == 1)
00096   // Configure Retarget UxART after the "ADC_Configuration()" since "ADC_Configuration()" changes the
00097   // Retarget AFIO as ADC.
00098   RETARGET_Configuration();
00099   #endif
00100 
00101   #if (ADC_GROUP_TRIGGER_MODE == ADC_GROUP_TRIGGER_MODE_SW)
00102   ADC_TriggerConfig_Software();
00103   #endif
00104 
00105   #if (ADC_GROUP_TRIGGER_MODE == ADC_GROUP_TRIGGER_MODE_TM)
00106   TM_Configuration();
00107   ADC_TriggerConfig_TM();
00108   #endif
00109 
00110   while (1)
00111   {
00112     ADC_Test_MainRoutine();
00113   }
00114 }
00115 
00116 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00117   * @brief  ADC group main routine
00118   * @retval None
00119   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00120 void ADC_Test_MainRoutine(void)
00121 {
00122   #if (ADC_GROUP_TRIGGER_MODE == ADC_GROUP_TRIGGER_MODE_SW)
00123   ADC_Test_MainRoutine_Softwre();
00124   #endif
00125 
00126   #if (ADC_GROUP_TRIGGER_MODE == ADC_GROUP_TRIGGER_MODE_TM)
00127   ADC_Test_MainRoutine_TM();
00128   #endif
00129 }
00130 
00131 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00132   * @brief  ADC Group main routine - Software trigger every 2 second and show the result.
00133   * @retval None
00134   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00135 void ADC_Test_MainRoutine_Softwre(void)
00136 {
00137   if (uTimeTick500ms >= 4)
00138   {
00139     uTimeTick500ms = 0;
00140 
00141     ADC_Group_SoftwareStart();
00142   }
00143 
00144   if (uADCGroupFinish == ADC_GROUP_FINISH)
00145   {
00146     uADCGroupFinish = 0;
00147     ADC_Test_ShowResult();
00148   }
00149 }
00150 
00151 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00152   * @brief  ADC Group main routine - Timer trigger every 2 second and show the result.
00153   * @retval None
00154   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00155 void ADC_Test_MainRoutine_TM(void)
00156 {
00157   if (uADCGroupFinish == ADC_GROUP_FINISH)
00158   {
00159     uADCGroupFinish = 0;
00160     ADC_Test_ShowResult();
00161   }
00162 }
00163 
00164 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00165   * @brief  Show ADC Result.
00166   * @retval None
00167   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00168 void ADC_Test_ShowResult(void)
00169 {
00170   u32 i;
00171 
00172   uADCData[0] &= 0x00000FFF;
00173   uADCData[1] &= 0x00000FFF;
00174   uADCData[2] &= 0x00000FFF;
00175   uADCData[3] &= 0x00000FFF;
00176   uADCData[4] &= 0x00000FFF;
00177   uADCData[5] &= 0x00000FFF;
00178   uADCData[6] &= 0x00000FFF;
00179   uADCData[7] &= 0x00000FFF;
00180   uADCData[8] &= 0x00000FFF;
00181   uADCData[9] &= 0x00000FFF;
00182   uADCData[10] &= 0x00000FFF;
00183   uADCData[11] &= 0x00000FFF;
00184   uADCData[12] &= 0x00000FFF;
00185   uADCData[13] &= 0x00000FFF;
00186   uADCData[14] &= 0x00000FFF;
00187   uADCData[15] &= 0x00000FFF;
00188 
00189   #if (ENABLE_DEBUG_PRINTF == 1)
00190   printf("\r\nADC Result\r\n");
00191   printf("ADC Group 1\r\n");
00192   for (i = 0; i < ADC_GROUP_LIST_LENGTH; i++)
00193   {
00194     printf("ADC Sequence %d = %d\r\n", i, uADCData[i]);
00195   }
00196   printf("ADC Group 2\r\n");
00197   for (i = 0; i < ADC_GROUP_LIST_LENGTH; i++)
00198   {
00199     printf("ADC Sequence %d = %d\r\n", i, uADCData[ADC_GROUP_LIST_LENGTH + i]);
00200   }
00201   #endif
00202 }

00205 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00206   * @brief  PDMA configuration.
00207   * @retval None
00208   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00209 void PDMA_Configuration(void)
00210 {
00211   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00212     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00213     CKCUClock.Bit.PDMA = 1;
00214     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00215   }
00216 
00217   { /* Configure PDMA channel to move ADC result from ADC->DR[0] to SRAM                                    */
00218 
00219     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00220        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00221        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00222     */
00223     PDMACH_InitTypeDef PDMACH_InitStructure;
00224 
00225     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_SrcAddr = (u32)&HT_ADC0->DR[0];
00226     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr = (u32)uADCData;
00227     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkCnt = 2;
00228     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkLen = ADC_GROUP_LIST_LENGTH;
00229     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DataSize = WIDTH_32BIT;
00230     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_Priority = VH_PRIO;
00231     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_AdrMod = SRC_ADR_CIR_INC | DST_ADR_LIN_INC | AUTO_RELOAD;
00232     PDMA_Config(PDMA_ADC0, &PDMACH_InitStructure);
00233     PDMA_EnaCmd(PDMA_ADC0, ENABLE);
00234   }
00235 
00236   PDMA_IntConfig(PDMA_CH0, (PDMA_INT_GE | PDMA_INT_TC), ENABLE);
00237 
00238   NVIC_EnableIRQ(PDMACH0_1_IRQn);
00239 }
00240 #endif
00241 
00242 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00243   * @brief  ADC configuration.
00244   * @retval None
00245   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00246 void ADC_Configuration(void)
00247 {
00248   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00249     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00250     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00251     CKCUClock.Bit.ADC0 = 1;
00252     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00253   }
00254 
00255   /* Configure AFIO mode as ADC function                                                                    */
00256   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADCCH0_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADCCH0_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00257   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADCCH1_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADCCH1_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00258   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADCCH2_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADCCH2_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00259   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADCCH3_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADCCH3_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00260   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADCCH4_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADCCH4_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00261   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADCCH5_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADCCH5_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00262   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADCCH6_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADCCH6_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00263   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADCCH7_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADCCH7_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00264   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADCCH8_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADCCH8_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00265   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADCCH9_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADCCH9_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00266   //AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADCCH10_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADCCH10_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00267   //AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADCCH11_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADCCH11_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00268   //AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADCCH12_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADCCH12_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00269   //AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADCCH13_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADCCH13_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00270   //AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADCCH14_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADCCH14_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00271   //AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADCCH15_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADCCH15_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00272 
00273   { /* ADC related settings                                                                                 */
00274     /* CK_ADC frequency is set to (CK_AHB / n)                                                              */
00275     #if (ENABLE_DEBUG_IO == 1)
00276     CKCU_SetADCnPrescaler(CKCU_ADCPRE_ADC0, CKCU_ADCPRE_DIV64);
00277     #else
00278     CKCU_SetADCnPrescaler(CKCU_ADCPRE_ADC0, CKCU_ADCPRE_DIV3);
00279     #endif
00280 
00281     /* One Shot mode, sequence length = ADC_GROUP_LIST_LENGTH                                               */
00282     ADC_RegularGroupConfig(HT_ADC0, ONE_SHOT_MODE, ADC_GROUP_LIST_LENGTH, 0);
00283 
00284     /* ADC conversion time = (Sampling time + Latency) / CK_ADC = (1.5 + ADST + 12.5) / CK_ADC              */
00285     /* Set ADST = 36, sampling time = 1.5 + ADST                                                            */
00286     #if (LIBCFG_ADC_SAMPLE_TIME_BY_CH)
00287       // The sampling time is set by the last parameter of the function "ADC_RegularChannelConfig()".
00288     #else
00289     ADC_SamplingTimeConfig(HT_ADC0, 36);
00290     #endif
00291 
00292     /* Set ADC conversion sequence as channel n                                                             */
00293     ADC_Group1Config();
00294   }
00295 
00296   /* Enable ADC cycle end of conversion interrupt                                                           */
00297   ADC_IntConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_INT_CYCLE_EOC, ENABLE);
00298 
00299   #if (ENABLE_DEBUG_IO == 1)
00300   ADC_IntConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_INT_SINGLE_EOC, ENABLE);
00301   #endif
00302 
00303   NVIC_EnableIRQ(ADC0_IRQn);
00304 
00305   #if (ADC_GROUP_DATA_MODE == ADC_GROUP_DATA_MODE_DMA)
00306   /* Issue ADC DMA request when cycle end of conversion occur                                               */
00307   ADC_PDMAConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_PDMA_REGULAR_CYCLE, ENABLE);
00308   #endif
00309 
00310   ADC_Cmd(HT_ADC0, ENABLE);
00311 }
00312 
00313 #if !defined(USE_HT32F50020_30) && !defined(USE_HT32F52234_44)
00314 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00315   * @brief  TM configuration.
00316   * @retval None
00317   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00318 void TM_Configuration(void)
00319 {
00320   /* Configure xxTM Channel 0 to trigger ADC start of conversion every 2 second                             */
00321 
00322   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00323     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00324     CKCUClock.Bit.GPTM0      = 1;
00325     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00326   }
00327 
00328   { /* Time base configuration                                                                              */
00329 
00330     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00331        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00332        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00333     */
00334     TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef TimeBaseInit;
00335 
00336     TimeBaseInit.Prescaler = (SystemCoreClock / 20000) - 1; // GPTM Clock is 20K
00337     TimeBaseInit.CounterReload = 40000 - 1;                 // 40000/20000 = 2 S;
00338     TimeBaseInit.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00339     TimeBaseInit.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00340     TimeBaseInit.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00341     TM_TimeBaseInit(HT_GPTM0, &TimeBaseInit);
00342   }
00343 
00344   { /* Channel n output configuration                                                                       */
00345 
00346     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00347        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00348        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00349     */
00350     TM_OutputInitTypeDef OutInit;
00351     OutInit.Channel = TM_CH_0;
00352     OutInit.OutputMode = TM_OM_PWM2;
00353     OutInit.Control = TM_CHCTL_ENABLE;
00354     OutInit.ControlN = TM_CHCTL_DISABLE;
00355     OutInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00356     OutInit.PolarityN = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00357     OutInit.IdleState = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00358     OutInit.IdleStateN = MCTM_OIS_HIGH;
00359     OutInit.Compare = 20000 - 1;
00360     OutInit.AsymmetricCompare = 0;
00361     TM_OutputInit(HT_GPTM0, &OutInit);
00362   }
00363 
00364   TM_IntConfig(HT_GPTM0, TM_INT_CH0CC, ENABLE);
00365 }
00366 #endif

00368 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00369   * @brief  Configure ADC trigger source as software.
00370   * @retval None
00371   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00372 void ADC_TriggerConfig_Software(void)
00373 {
00374   ADC_RegularTrigConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_TRIG_SOFTWARE);
00375 }
00376 
00377 #if !defined(USE_HT32F50020_30) && !defined(USE_HT32F52234_44)
00378 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00379   * @brief  Configure ADC trigger source as Timer.
00380   * @retval None
00381   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00382 void ADC_TriggerConfig_TM(void)
00383 {
00384   ADC_RegularTrigConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_TRIGGER_TM_SOURCE);
00385   TM_Cmd(HT_GPTM0, ENABLE);
00386 }

00389 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00390   * @brief  Software trigger of ADC Group
00391   * @retval None
00392   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00393 void ADC_Group_SoftwareStart(void)
00394 {
00395   uADCGroupFinish = 0;
00396   ADC_SoftwareStartConvCmd(HT_ADC0, ENABLE);
00397 }
00398 
00399 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00400   * @brief  Configure ADC conversion list as group 1.
00401   * @retval None
00402   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00403 void ADC_Group1Config(void)
00404 {
00405   HT_ADC0->LST[0] = (ADC_GROUP1_LIST0 << 0)  | \
00406                     (ADC_GROUP1_LIST1 << 8)  | \
00407                     (ADC_GROUP1_LIST2 << 16) | \
00408                     (ADC_GROUP1_LIST3 << 24);
00409 
00410   #if !defined(USE_HT32F50020_30)
00411   HT_ADC0->LST[1] = (ADC_GROUP1_LIST4 << 0)  | \
00412                     (ADC_GROUP1_LIST5 << 8)  | \
00413                     (ADC_GROUP1_LIST6 << 16) | \
00414                     (ADC_GROUP1_LIST7 << 24);
00415   #endif
00416 
00417   HT_ADC0->CR &= ~(0x00070700);
00418   HT_ADC0->CR |= ((u32)(0 - 1) << 16) | ((u32)(ADC_GROUP_LIST_LENGTH - 1) << 8);
00419 
00420   #if 0
00421   ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_GROUP1_LIST0, 0);
00422   ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_GROUP1_LIST1, 1);
00423   ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_GROUP1_LIST2, 2);
00424   ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_GROUP1_LIST3, 3);
00425   ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_GROUP1_LIST4, 4);
00426   ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_GROUP1_LIST5, 5);
00427   ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_GROUP1_LIST6, 6);
00428   ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_GROUP1_LIST7, 7);
00429   ADC_RegularGroupConfig(HT_ADC0, ONE_SHOT_MODE, ADC_GROUP_LIST_LENGTH, 0);
00430   #endif
00431 }
00432 
00433 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00434   * @brief  Configure ADC conversion list as group 2.
00435   * @retval None
00436   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00437 void ADC_Group2Config(void)
00438 {
00439   HT_ADC0->LST[0] = (ADC_GROUP2_LIST0 << 0)  | \
00440                     (ADC_GROUP2_LIST1 << 8)  | \
00441                     (ADC_GROUP2_LIST2 << 16) | \
00442                     (ADC_GROUP2_LIST3 << 24);
00443 
00444   #if !defined(USE_HT32F50020_30)
00445   HT_ADC0->LST[1] = (ADC_GROUP2_LIST4 << 0)  | \
00446                     (ADC_GROUP2_LIST5 << 8)  | \
00447                     (ADC_GROUP2_LIST6 << 16) | \
00448                     (ADC_GROUP2_LIST7 << 24);
00449 
00450   HT_ADC0->CR &= ~(0x00070700);
00451   HT_ADC0->CR |= ((u32)(0 - 1) << 16) | ((u32)(ADC_GROUP_LIST_LENGTH - 1) << 8);
00452   #endif
00453 
00454   #if 0
00455   ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_GROUP2_LIST0, 0);
00456   ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_GROUP2_LIST1, 1);
00457   ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_GROUP2_LIST2, 2);
00458   ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_GROUP2_LIST3, 3);
00459   ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_GROUP2_LIST4, 4);
00460   ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_GROUP2_LIST5, 5);
00461   ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_GROUP2_LIST6, 6);
00462   ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_GROUP2_LIST7, 7);
00463   ADC_RegularGroupConfig(HT_ADC0, ONE_SHOT_MODE, ADC_GROUP_LIST_LENGTH, 0);
00464   #endif
00465 }
00466 
00467 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00468   * @brief  ADC group process of Interrupt Handler (CPU reads ADC result).
00469   * @retval None
00470   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00471 void ADC_GroupProcess(void)
00472 {
00473   #if (ADC_GROUP_DATA_MODE == ADC_GROUP_DATA_MODE_CPU)
00474   static u32 guDataIndex = 0;
00475   u32 i;
00476   #endif
00477 
00478   #if (ENABLE_DEBUG_IO == 1)
00479   if (ADC_GetFlagStatus(HT_ADC0, ADC_FLAG_SINGLE_EOC))
00480   {
00481     ADC_ClearIntPendingBit(HT_ADC0, ADC_FLAG_SINGLE_EOC);
00482     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED2);
00483     //HT_GPIOA->DOUTR ^= (1 << 14);
00484   }
00485   #endif
00486 
00487   if (ADC_GetFlagStatus(HT_ADC0, ADC_FLAG_CYCLE_EOC))
00488   {
00489     ADC_ClearIntPendingBit(HT_ADC0, ADC_FLAG_CYCLE_EOC);
00490     if (uADCGroupState == 1)
00491     {
00492       uADCGroupState = 2;
00493 
00494       #if (ADC_GROUP_DATA_MODE == ADC_GROUP_DATA_MODE_CPU)
00495       guDataIndex = 0;
00496       for (i = 0; i < ADC_GROUP_LIST_LENGTH; i++)
00497       {
00498         uADCData[guDataIndex + i] = HT_ADC0->DR[i];
00499       }
00500       guDataIndex = ADC_GROUP_LIST_LENGTH;
00501       #endif
00502 
00503       ADC_Group2Config();
00504 
00505       // Trigger ADC by Software when group 1 conversion is finished
00506       ADC_RegularTrigConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_TRIG_SOFTWARE);
00507       ADC_SoftwareStartConvCmd(HT_ADC0, ENABLE);
00508     }
00509     else
00510     {
00511       uADCGroupState = 1;
00512 
00513       #if (ADC_GROUP_DATA_MODE == ADC_GROUP_DATA_MODE_CPU)
00514       for (i = 0; i < ADC_GROUP_LIST_LENGTH; i++)
00515       {
00516         uADCData[guDataIndex + i] = HT_ADC0->DR[i];
00517       }
00518 
00519       uADCGroupFinish = ADC_GROUP_FINISH;
00520       #endif
00521 
00522       ADC_Group1Config();
00523 
00524       // Restore the trigger source when group 2 conversion is finished
00525       #if (ADC_GROUP_TRIGGER_MODE == ADC_GROUP_TRIGGER_MODE_TM)
00526       ADC_RegularTrigConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_TRIGGER_TM_SOURCE);
00527       #endif
00528 
00529       #if (ENABLE_DEBUG_IO == 1)
00530       HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED1);
00531       #endif
00532     }
00533   }
00534 }
00535 
00536 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00537   * @brief  SysTick configuration.
00538   * @retval None
00539   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00540 void SysTick_Configuration(void)
00541 {
00542   SYSTICK_ClockSourceConfig(SYSTICK_SRC_STCLK);         /* Default : CK_AHB/8                               */
00543   SYSTICK_SetReloadValue(SystemCoreClock / 8 / 2);      /* (CK_AHB/8/2) = 500ms                             */
00544   SYSTICK_IntConfig(ENABLE);                            /* Enable SYSTICK Interrupt                         */
00545   SYSTICK_CounterCmd(SYSTICK_COUNTER_CLEAR);
00546   SYSTICK_CounterCmd(SYSTICK_COUNTER_ENABLE);
00547 }
00548 
00549 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00550 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00551   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00552   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00553   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00554   * @retval None
00555   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00556 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00557 {
00558   /*
00559      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00560      Debug message can be added here.
00561      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00562   */
00563 
00564   while (1)
00565   {
00566   }
00567 }
00568 #endif
00569 
00570 
00571 /**
00572   * @}
00573   */
00574 
00575 /**
00576   * @}
00577   */
